segments.text: Our benefits usually include medical insurance , public accumulation fund and allowances .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you go on a business trip , you will enjoy the allowance . It is 200 yuan per day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I see . And what about the vacation in our company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As a new-comer , you usually have five days of annual vacation . And remember you have to fill out a request form , if you want to ask for leave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will our company have some recreational activities ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . In spring and autumn , we will hold some sports actives . And in movie seasons , we bulk purchase film tickets .
segments.speaker: S1
